title: ExaVault
description:
ExaVault's API allows you to incorporate ExaVault's suite of file transfer and user management tools into your own application.

ExaVault supports both POST (recommended when requesting large data sets) and GET operations, and requires an API key in order to use.

username.name: username
username.description: Name of of user to authenticate

methods.displayName: Authenticates a user into the API

access_token.name: access_token

sendEmail.name: sendEmail

emails.name: emails
emails.description: Email addresses to send notification to. If not specified, sends to owner by default.

methods.description: Requires access token obtained via the authenticateUser operation. Available to users with 'notification' permission

type.name: type
type.description: The type of share to create: shared_folder, send, receive.

filePaths.name: filePaths
filePaths.description: Array of strings containing the file paths to share.

emails.name: emails
emails.description: Array of strings for email recipients (for email invitations).

requireEmail.name: requireEmail
requireEmail.description: Requires a user's email to access (defaults to false if not specified).

accessMode.name: accessMode
accessMode.description: Type of permissions share recipients have: upload, download, download_upload, download_upload_modify, download_upload_modify_delete. Defaults to download if no option specified.

embed.name: embed
embed.description: Allows user to embed a widget with the share. Defaults to false if not specified.

isPublic.name: isPublic
isPublic.description: True if share has a public URL, otherwise defaults to false

password.name: password
password.description: If not null, value of password is required to access this Share

expiration.name: expiration
expiration.description: The date the current Share should expire, formatted YYYY-mm-dd

hasNotification.name: hasNotification
hasNotification.description: True if the user should be notified about activity on this Share.

notificationEmails.name: notificationEmails
notificationEmails.description: An array of recipients who should receive notification emails.

fileDropCreateFolders.name: fileDropCreateFolders
fileDropCreateFolders.description: If true, all receive folder submissions will be uploaded separate folders (only applicable for Receive folder types)
